name: Highland Estate Blend
description: A rich and smooth blend sourced from local highland coffee farms.

name: Sunrise Mountain Single-Origin
description: A vibrant and fruity coffee grown on a single estate in the region's mountain ranges.

name: Coastal Reserve
description: A medium-bodied coffee from coastal plantations, known for its balanced flavor profile.

name: Rainforest Reserve
description: Shade-grown coffee from local rainforest farms, offering an earthy and exotic taste.

name: Village Farmer Reserve
description: Small-batch coffee grown by local farmers in the valleys, known for its bright acidity.

name: Local Peaberry Selection
description: Rare peaberry coffee sourced from small-scale farms, prized for its unique intensity.

name: Peaberry Green-Bean
description: Green peaberry coffee sourced from small-scale farms, prized for its unique intensity.
